FontString.name: $parentHidePartyTextRaid
FontString.text: Hide party frame out of raid

FontString.name: $parentSendRARS
FontString.text: Send RS messages to RA also

FontString.name: $parentNoHealer
FontString.text: Your class does not have any heals with cast times.

FontString.name: $parentHealer
FontString.text: Setting the value to 0 will disable checking for that spell.
Notify me when someone is debuffed with selected
Notify when a buff you can cast has faded
Note that both class and group must fit the requirements

FontString.name: $parentPlayerInfo
FontString.text: Sets the scale of raid windows.

FontString.name: $parentThresholdInfo
FontString.text: Displays up to 5 health bars of the party/raid members with the lowest health.

FontString.name: $parentInfo
FontString.text: Changes the health and mana bars' background opacity.

FontString.name: $parentName
FontString.text: Health and Mana Bars' Background Opacity

FontString.name: $parentEditing
FontString.text: Type in the name of the new set:

FontString.name: $parentUnavailable
FontString.text: This name is already used by another set.

Scripts.OnShow: getglobal(this:GetName() .. "Delete"):SetText("Are you sure you want to delete\n'|c00FFFFFF" .. this.name .. "|r'?"); PlaySound("UChatScrollButton");
